titleStmt.title: A trve and impartiall relation of the battaile betwixt His Majesties army and that of the rebells neare Newbury in Berk-shire, Sept. 20, 1643 with the severall actions of the Kings army since His Maiesties removing it from before Gloucester : sent in a letter from the army to a noble lord.
titleStmt.author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Digby by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
